tool_description: This Flask API generates random usernames. Introducing the ultimate username generator! Our API is designed to generate unique and creative usernames for your website or application, without compromising on security.
name: username generator
title: username generator

api_list.name: Username
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://username-generator.p.rapidapi.com/username"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "username-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests
